original: Cirosan
translation: jfader

original: After finishing the events of Lonesome Road, if Ulysses survived, you can recruit him as a permanent companion to follow you throughout the Mojave.
translation: [CodePage 936]

original: A message will be delivered to all current companions, wherever they happen to be, that they are to return home.\n\nAre you sure you wish to do this?
translation: 一个信息将被传递给所有当前的同伴，无论他们碰巧在哪里，他们将会回家。\n\n你确定要这么做吗？

original: No.
translation: 不。

original: Yes.
translation: 是的。

original: Notification sent...
translation: 通知已发送...

original: Ulysses' Mask
translation: 尤利西斯的面具

original: 12.7mm Submachine Gun
translation: 12.7mm冲锋枪

original: Old Glory
translation: 星条旗

original: Grand Slam
translation: 大满贯

original: Ulysses
translation: 尤利西斯

original: To Courier Six
translation: 致六号信使

original:
&PCName; -

If you're reading this, I didn't make it to the end of the road with you. Expected as much. Your road is to be walked alone - to join you on it is a death sentence. Others probably feel it too. But I do not regret walking the long road with you. You gave me another life at the Divide - only fair I give you the same in exchange.

No, you gave me more than that at the Divide. Showed me a world that could be. A world that is waiting to be born. A world made from conviction and action, that stands tall above the ruins of old. Too many chain themselves to the Old World - they borrow ideas, beliefs, appearances, identities from a world that died long ago. But not you. You leave it behind, learn from it without becoming a slave to it.

"Who are you, that do not know your history?" A question I asked the Old World. A question I asked you. A question I asked myself. So many in the Mojave do not know the answer. They carry flags without knowing their history, they follow symbols without knowing their meaning. That is why so many - like me - are drawn to follow you. You carry the shadow of a nation to be - you are a nation unto yourself, unbound by the weakness and prejudice of the Old World. You are the voice of the New World, and whatever flag you follow, the Mojave will bow before it.

To us, America is not dead. I carried it on my back, and now you carry it in your actions and words. You will remake it in your image. America will be whatever you choose to make it. The Mojave is only the beginning. You are the first breath of a new nation. That is your road. I am proud to have walked a part of it with you, as one Courier follows another.

- Ulysses
translation:
&PCName; -

如果你正在读这些文字，那么我并没有和你一起走到旅程尽头，和预期的一样。你的路要独自走-与你同行的人终将灭亡，其他人也可能感觉到了。但是我不后悔和你一起走过如此长路。你在大裂谷给了我第二次生命-我只能以我命相报。

不，你给予我的一切不仅仅是在大裂谷，你向我展示了世界的另一种可能。一个等待新生的世界，由信念和行动构成的世界，高高耸立在旧世界的废墟之上。太多人将自己束缚于旧世界-他们带着早已死去的旧世的思想，信念，外表和身份，但你不一样。你超越历史，从中学习而不被束缚。

“你是谁，你不知道自己的过去吗？”我面对旧世界，心中有这样一个问题，我问过你同样的问题，我问过自己同样的问题。莫哈韦有许多人不知道这一切的答案。他们不知道旧世界历史，却挥舞它的旗帜；在不理解一个图腾时，转而去追随它。这也就是为何如此众多的人，像我一样，被你吸引着跟随你的原因。你背后是一个国家的影子--你自己就是一个国家，不受旧世界的软弱和偏见所束缚。你是新世界的声音，无论你追随的旗帜是什么，莫哈韦沙漠都将在此折服。

对我们来说，美国还没有死。我背负着它，现在轮到你来用话语和行动来重现它。你会在想象中重塑她。美国将再现你为她选择的愿景。莫哈韦只是开始。你会如同这个新国家活下去必须的空气，那是你的道路。我很自豪能和你一起经历这一切，一位信使跟随着另一位信使。

-尤利西斯

original: GREETING
translation: 问好

original: Can hear the weight in your feet - you’re bound for that Old World wall. Hoover Dam.
translation: 可以听到脚上的重压-你束缚在旧世界的墙壁上， 胡佛水坝。

original: But even if there is hope in change... it may not matter.
translation: 但是，即使有改变的希望……也可能没关系。

original: Whatever is built, the Bear, Bull... even Vegas... will tear it apart, convert it, either with purpose, or by accident.
translation: 无论建造什么，熊、公牛...甚至维加斯...会撕裂它，改变它，不管是有意的，还是无意的。

original: That's part of why I'm here. I do this because I care, because I believe it must be done.
translation: 那就是我在这里的部分原因。 我这样做是因为我在乎这一切，因为我相信必须这样做。

original: And when I saw the Divide you made, I saw a second chance, a new way of thinking.
translation: 当我看到你创造出的大裂谷时，我看到了第二次机会，一种全新的思维方式。

original: Comes down to perspective, how far one's walked, and what they've left behind. History has proven this. Our history.
translation: 可以总结这一切的，是一个人行走的道路，一个人遗留的事物。 历史证明了这一点，我们的历史。

original: It may be... that as much destruction has been written in the earth here... you may build something else, as you built the Divide.
translation: 可能……这片土地上已有了许多毁灭的记录……你可以造出其他东西，就像创造大裂谷一样。

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见。

original: The Mojave awaits.
translation: 莫哈维在等着我们。

original: Enough talk for now. Let's get back on the road.
translation: 现在已经谈够了。 让我们上路吧。

original: {Farewell}The Divide belongs to history now. {Beat}The Mojave awaits.
translation: {Farewell}大裂谷现在属于历史了，{Beat}莫哈维在等待。

original: Nothing more to say. I'll be going.
translation: 没什么可说的了，我要走了。

original: Attack
translation: 攻击

original: The Divide'll be your grave.
translation: 大裂谷将成为你的坟墓。

original: The Divide'll be your grave.
translation: 大裂谷将成为你的坟墓。

original: Let's have an ending to this.
translation: 让我们结束这一切吧。

original: Murder
translation: 杀人犯

original: You have forgotten all you were, traded glory for savagery.
translation: 你已经忘记了曾经的一切，以荣耀换来了野蛮。

original: Something else to answer for.
translation: 我还有其他要问的。

original: Justice of a sort.
translation: 这算某种正义吗。

original: What you did was for the best.
translation: 你所做的是为了最大的利益。

original: Courier'll show soon.
translation: 邮差很快就会出现。

original: This is the ending they deserve.
translation: 这是他们应得的结局。

original: Another Old World soldier falls.
translation: 又一位旧世界的士兵倒下了。

original: Wait here.
translation: 在这等着。

original: Keep the walks short. Until then, I wait and watch.
translation: 别走远。 在你回来之前，我会一直等待观望。

original: Let's trade equipment.
translation: 我们交易装备吧。

original: If you want these Old World relics, they're yours.
translation: 如果你想要这些旧世界的遗物，它们就是你的。

original: Enough about tactics.
translation: 不说战术了。

original: Then there is nothing more to be done.
translation: 接下来没有其他事情要做了。

original: Keep your distance. Try to flank them.
translation: 和他们保持距离。不妨从侧面攻击他们。

original: Courier to Courier.
translation: 从信使到信使。

original: All right, you're good. Let's get out of here.
translation: 好的，就这样。我们走吧。

original: The Mojave awaits.
translation: 莫哈维在等着我们。

original: Your distance is good. Let's talk about something else.
translation: 你的距离不错。让我们谈谈其他事。

original: Something else in you needing an answer?
translation: 你还需要其他答案吗？

original: Stay close to me.
translation: 紧跟着我。

original: Just you and me, then.
translation: 只有你我了。

original: Let's talk about how close you're following me.
translation: 我们来讨论下你我之间的距离。

original: Didn't think I'd be breathing to hear you say that.
translation: 没想到我会活着听到你这么说。

original: I want you to use ranged weapons.
translation: 我希望你使用远距攻击武器。

original: Then that is what shall be done.
translation: 那就是应该做的。

original: Switch to a melee weapon.
translation: 切换到近战武器。

original: Better off saving ammo.
translation: 最好省点弹药。

original: Let's talk about something else.
translation: 让我们谈点别的。

original: Something else in you needing an answer?
translation: 你还需要其他答案吗？

original: That's all. Let's get going.
translation: 就这样。我们走吧。

original: The Mojave awaits.
translation: 莫哈维在等着我们。

original: I want you to change your combat style.
translation: 我希望你改变你的战斗风格。

original: Why do you care?
translation: 你为什么在意这个？

original: Let's talk about your tactics.
translation: 我们谈谈你的战术吧。

original: Then I will listen.
translation: 那我尊听悉便。

original: I just wanted to make sure you were still here. Goodbye.
translation: 我只想确认你还在这。再见。

original: Not just yet. I wanted to talk to you about something.
translation: 还没。我想和你谈谈。

original: Let's get going.
translation: 我们走。

original: The Mojave awaits.
translation: 莫哈维在等着我们。

original: It's time for us to part ways.
translation: 我们该分道扬镳了。

original: Better be sure.
translation: 你先确定要这样做。

original: I think we should travel together.
translation: 我觉得我们应该同行。

original: Full circle, walked your road - now back again.
translation: 走上你自己的道路，绕了一圈-现在又回来了。

original: Not my way. Just you and me - Courier to Courier.
translation: 这不是我的风格，只需要你我同行-只需要信使。

original: On second thought, stick with me for a little longer.
translation: 我想了一下，还是留在我身边吧。

original: I'm not one for it, either.
translation: 我也不是这样一个人。

original: On second thought, never mind. I'm not one to break a partnership when there's still work to do.
translation: 考虑了一下，当我没说。 仍有工作要做，我也不是破坏伙伴关系的人。

original: Yes, I'm sure.
translation: 是的，我确定。

original: Can do that and one better. I'll meet you above Hopeville, near the Canyon Wreckage.
translation: 我能做的比你想的事更多。 我会在峡谷残骸附近的希望谷悬崖上等着你。

original: Yes, I'm sure. Return to the Divide and keep watch there until I'm ready for us to travel again.
translation: 是，我确定。 返回大裂谷并在那里观察，直到我准备好再次和你旅行。

original: Then that is what shall be done.
translation: 这便是应该做的。

original: I want you not to attack enemies unless I've already engaged them.
translation: 如果我没有动手，你也不要擅自攻击敌人。

original: There... is a strange honor in that.
translation: 那...有一种奇怪的荣誉感。

original: I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
translation: 我要你看到敌人就马上攻击他们。

original: Didn't think that would matter any more to you.
translation: 我还以为你不会在意了。

original: I'd like you to go back to the Lucky 38 for now.
translation: 我希望你现在回幸运38赌场去。

original: Back to symbols and history, then. Still... it's important to see.
translation: 回到那些符号和历史。 是的，那里仍然...很值得去见证。

original: I'm sure. For now, go back to the Lucky 38, and see New Vegas for all that it is. Know its history.
translation: 我肯定。 现在，回到幸运38，然后看看新的维加斯，了解它的历史。

original: Don't need Old World medicine to kill you.
translation: 我不需要旧世界的药就能杀死你。

original: If my life burns out here, so be it.
translation: 如果我的生命在这里燃尽，那便如此吧。

original: Don't need Old World medicine to kill you.
translation: 我不需要旧世界的药就能杀死你。

original: If my life burns out here, so be it.
translation: 如果我的生命在这里燃尽，那便如此吧。

original: Wake
translation: 醒来

original: I will not let America die here.
translation: 我不会让美国在这里死去。

original: I thought it was the end.
translation: 我本以为这就是我的结局。

original: Hard to kill... like Couriers.
translation: 难以杀死...像信使一样。

original: Old World's running out of machines.
translation: 旧世界的机器已经损耗尽了。

original: Nothing to be gained by me holding them, and more will surface in time.
translation: 我带着它们无济于事，世上总有新东西。

original: Watch the shadows.
translation: 注意暗处。

original: Perhaps the shadow of the Bull does walk with you.
translation: 也许公牛的影子正与你同行。

original: What are you doing here?
translation: 你在这里做什么？

original: A question one could have asked you not long ago, before walking the road West into the storms.
translation: 这是不久前，在向西走到风暴中之前，人们可能会问你的问题。

original: Need to be here, see what was done. It's custom of the Bear to never see the marks it claws in the land... not {emph}my custom.
translation: 我得在这里，看看发生了什么。熊的习惯是永远不看它在土地上的留下的爪痕...这可不是{emph}我的习惯。

original: Maybe that's why you've come, too - need to see where the missile from Ashton touched ground down below, in Hopeville... the Courier's Mile.
translation: 也许这也是你来的原因 - 想看看阿什顿的导弹落在黎明镇的什么地方...邮差之路。

original: Need to be here, see what was done. In the Divide, in Hopeville... the Courier's Mile.
translation: 我得在这里，看看发生了什么。在大裂谷，在黎明镇...邮差之路。

original: Can you tell me again what you're doing here?
translation: 你能再告诉我一次你在这里做什么吗？

original: Was hoping you could help me shape something.
translation: 希望你能帮我塑造一些东西。

original: {Nods}Let's see what gifts the Mojave has for us.
translation: {Nods}让我们看看莫哈维给我们带来了什么礼物。

original: {Nods}Let's see what gifts the Mojave has for us.
translation: {Nods}让我们看看莫哈维给我们带来了什么礼物。

original: I've gathered some materials here. Can you make anything with them?
translation: 我收集了一些材料。 你能用他们做些什么吗？

original: {Looking at player's inventory}Let's make something new from the old.
translation: {Looking at player's inventory}让我们来变废为宝吧。

original: {Looking at player's inventory}Let's make something new from the old.
translation: {Looking at player's inventory}让我们来变废为宝吧。

original: I've gathered some materials here. Can you make anything with them?
translation: 我收集了一些材料。 你能用他们做些什么吗？

original: Find anything in the dust of Hopeville?
translation: 在黎明镇的尘土里找到什么了吗？

original: Nothing but wind, sand... ash. More may reveal itself in time, not now.
translation: 除了风与沙...灰烬。也许随着时间的流逝更多的会慢慢浮现，但不是现在。

original: If you're determined, return, might be something new surfaces.
translation: 如果你下定决心，回来，可能会有新的发现。

original: Wind and blood has uncovered more beneath the soil.
translation: 风和血揭开了土壤下面更多的东西。

original: If you want these Old World relics, they're yours... better you carry them than the Marked Men.
translation: 如果你想要这些旧世界的遗物，那么它们都归你了...至少你带着它们比落在烙印者手里要好。

original: Is this where you're making camp?
translation: 你在这里扎营吗？

original: Not a camp - vigil, maybe. Never claimed it as mine. {More a question}If anyone owns the Divide... {"well..."}your claim is stronger than mine.
translation: 不是营地 - 岗哨吧，或许。我从未声称它属于我。{More a question}如果说有人拥有大裂谷...{"well..."}你的声明比我更有力。

original: Don't feel like adding a campfire to the ones that already burn below. {Beat, making offer}If you brought Mojave gifts, might be able to shape something for the road.
translation: 不要想在下面已经燃烧的篝火上再加一把了。{Beat, making offer}如果你带来了莫哈维的礼物，也许能在路上塑造一些东西。

original: The Divide's irradiated... are you sure you want to stay here?
translation: 整个大裂谷都被辐射覆盖...你确定要留在这里吗？

original: The invisible fires burn here, true enough. Still... to have helped carry out such an act, then not face it...
translation: 无形的火焰在这里燃烧，这是事实。但是...帮助实施这样的行为，然后又不去面对...

original: Not my way. If my life burns out here, so be it... until then, I wait and watch, see what the road brings.
translation: 这不是我的方式。如果我的生命要在这里燃烧殆尽，那就这样吧...在那之前,我会等待和观察，看看这条路能带来什么。

original: What about the Marked Men?
translation: 那些烙印者呢？

original: That's part of why I'm here. Watch them - if they attack me, try to enter the Mojave, I answer. {Little quieter}Not looking to kill them... save them, if I can.
translation: 这就是我在这里的部分原因。观察他们 - 如果他们攻击我，或尝试进入莫哈维，我就会作出回应。{Little quieter}不是想杀了他们...而是拯救他们，如果可以的话。

original: There might be something saving in them. {Quieter, to himself}If not, then what I do is mercy, not murder.
translation: 他们身上可能还有什么值得拯救的。{Quieter, to himself}但如果没有，那么我的行为就是一种仁慈，而不是谋杀。

original: Have you been to Hopeville since the Ashton missile hit?
translation: 阿什顿导弹袭击后你去过黎明镇吗？

original: {Reflective}Walk there sometimes, keep the walks short. Still... it's important to see. Something else to answer for.
translation: {Reflective}有时会去那儿走走，时间不会太常。这...仍然很重要，还有一些事情需要答案。

original: Occasionally sift through the dust, the buildings... see if I can find some history. Marks of America.
translation: 偶尔筛过灰尘，建筑物...看看能不能找到一些历史。美国的印记。

original: If you want them, keep them... you've earned it. Nothing to be gained by me holding them, and more will surface in time.
translation: 如果你想要它们，就留着吧...这是你应得的。我拿着它们没有什么好处，迟早会有更多的东西浮现出来。

original: Caesar is dead, died on the operating table.
translation: 凯撒死了，死在手术台上。

original: {DUPE}{Thinking, slow}Name's died twice to history. If the West thanks you... the East won't, in time. Fall apart, back to the tribes, maybe.
translation: {DUPE}{Thinking, slow}这个名字在历史上已经死去了两次。如果西部感谢你...东部就不会。最终分崩离析，回到部落，也许吧。

original: Caesar is dead, I killed him.
translation: 凯撒死了，我把他做掉了。

original: {Thinking, slow}Name's died twice to history. If the West thanks you... the East won't, in time. Fall apart, back to the tribes, maybe.
translation: {Thinking, slow}这个名字在历史上已经死去了两次。如果西部感谢你...东部就不会。最终分崩离析，回到部落，也许吧。

original: Caesar's words... I honored them. I believed in what I followed then.
translation: 凯撒的话语...我缅怀它们，我曾坚信我所追随之物。

original: But no, I cannot go back. I wandered too far, far enough to know my home was lost to me.
translation: 但此刻不同，我无法回头。我漫游的太远，我已明白我的故土离我如此遥远。

original: My home in the East, Dry Wells, is no more. It is part of the Legion.
translation: 我在东边的故土，枯井，荡然无存。它已被军团吞噬。

original: It's where my tribe was taken. Where another history was put to the blade, lesson taught.
translation: 我的部落被带往此地。那里的又是一段血腥的历史，一个教训。

original: It is where we realized Vulpes did not approach us as equals. Where we realized the wolf had come, and we watched our history die.
translation: 在那里我们意识到沃尔普斯并没有平等地对待我们。在那里，我们意识到狼来了，我们看着我们的历史死去。

original: Now it belongs to Legion... and all the death there now belongs to them as well.
translation: 现在它归于军团...那个地方的一切死亡也归结于他们。

original: Done with blame, and Caesar was big on strength making right.
translation: 尽管所行之事被人指责，凯撒的力量强到足以维护一切的秩序。

original: If he was too weak to stop you, too weak to defend himself, then he needed to die with his beliefs.
translation: 如果他太软弱，无力阻止你，无力保护自己，那么他就需要带着信仰死去。

original: That history has been written, its lessons learned. Not revenge... just the way of things when you own them.
translation: 那段历史被记录，人们会学到教训。这并非复仇...你拥有一切时，便会发生这种事。

original: You don't understand. You will.
translation: 你现在不明白，你会明白的。

original: Why did you help me kill Caesar? You were once Legion.
translation: 你为什么会帮我杀死凯撒？你曾经在军团中。

original: I reached Vegas, and I dealt with House.
translation: 我到了维加斯，和豪斯打了交道。

original: {Choosing his words carefully}House spoke, acted through machines. Sometimes can judge a man by his messengers. {Referring to player}Sometimes the messengers judge him.
translation: {Choosing his words carefully}豪斯通过机器说话、行动。有时可以通过他的信使评判一个人，{Referring to player}有时信使会评判他。

original: Wonder what happens to Vegas now. The tribes - families. We'll see.
translation: 想知道现在的维加斯会发生什么。那些部落 - 家族，我们拭目以待。

original: {Choosing his words carefully}House spoke, acted through machines. Sometimes can judge a man by his messengers. {Referring to player}Sometimes the messengers judge him.
translation: {Choosing his words carefully}豪斯通过机器说话、行动。有时可以通过他的信使评判一个人，{Referring to player}有时信使会评判他。

original: Wonder what happens to Vegas now. The tribes - families. We'll see.
translation: 想知道现在的维加斯会发生什么。那些部落 - 家族，我们拭目以待。

original: House is dead by our hands. What do you make of that?
translation: 豪斯死于我们之手。你如何看此事？

original: I got your final message.
translation: 我收到了你最后的信息。

original: {Slightly amused}Didn’t think I’d be breathing to hear you say that. {Beat, “Still...”}Message isn’t important, meaning is.
translation: {Slightly amused}没想到我还能活着听你说这话。{Beat}消息并不重要，意义才是。

original: Had to speak of it, in case the words got lost in paper, ink, or other's voices. Maybe even yours, in time.
translation: 必须说出来，以防这些单词被纸、墨水或其他的声音淹没。甚至可能是你的，迟早。

original: Still, meant for you. Courier to Courier. {Beat}Belongs to you now, or history. Doesn't matter.
translation: 尽管如此，是给你的，邮差给邮差。{Beat}现在属于你了，或者属于历史。不重要了。

original: I'm heading back to the Mojave to settle some things.
translation: 我要回莫哈韦去处理一些事情。

original: {As player is about to leave}Can hear the weight in your feet - you’re bound for that Old World wall. Hoover Dam. Maybe not now - in time.
translation: {As player is about to leave}我能听到你脚下的重量 - 你要前往那堵旧世界的墙，胡佛大坝。或许不是现在 - 迟早。

original: I'm heading back to the Mojave to settle some things.
translation: 我要回莫哈韦去处理一些事情。

original: {As player is about to leave}Can hear the weight in your feet - you’re bound for that Old World wall. Hoover Dam. Maybe not now - in time.
translation: {As player is about to leave}我能听到你脚下的重量 - 你要前往那堵旧世界的墙，胡佛大坝。或许不是现在 - 迟早。

original: Let's get moving. There's a lot of work left to be done in the Mojave.
translation: 我们走吧，莫哈维还有许多事等待我们完成。

original: You could come with me, you know. Be there at Hoover Dam and help me change the symbols of men.
translation: 你可以和我同行。 在胡佛水坝那里，帮助我改变人类的图腾。

original: Not my way. If my life burns out here, so be it.
translation: 那不是我的未来，如果我的生命在此地燃烧殆尽，那就这样吧。

original: Still... to have helped carry out such an act, then not face it...
translation: 但是...助长了如此暴行，却不必面对结果...

original: Exactly. If what we did at the Divide is to matter, we need to cement it with a victory at the Dam.
translation: 没错，如果我们在大裂谷所做的一切都很重要的话，就要在大坝取得胜利确保这一切。

original: There is truth in your words. There is a shadow of a nation behind you, the hope of a people...
translation: 你的话语里有真理。你的背后有一个国家的影子，一个人民的希望...

original: Your actions have carried strength. If we must survive to carry its message... then that is what shall be done. I will not let America die here.
translation: 你的行动带来了力量。如果我们必须生存下去，以传递它的信息...那就应该这样做。我不会让美国死在这里。

original: Let's make something new from the old. The Mojave awaits.
translation: 让我们用旧世之物来重新创造，莫哈维等着我们。

original: What will history say about you if you spend its most pivotal moments sitting here doing nothing?
translation: 如果你在如此关键的时刻留在此地无所作为，历史会如何评价你？

original: There is truth in your words. There is a shadow of a nation behind you, the hope of a people...
translation: 你的话语里有真理。你的背后有一个国家的影子，一个人民的希望...

original: Your actions have carried strength. If we must survive to carry its message... then that is what shall be done. I will not let America die here.
translation: 你的行动带来了力量。如果我们必须生存下去，以传递它的信息...那就应该这样做。我不会让美国死在这里。

original: Let's make something new from the old. The Mojave awaits.
translation: 让我们用旧世之物来重新创造，莫哈维等着我们。

original: You hypocrite. You say actions show strength, but you want to sit it out while I change the world?
translation: 你个伪君子。你说行动显示力量，等我去改变世界的时候，你就想一直呆在这里？

original: There is truth in your words. There is a shadow of a nation behind you, the hope of a people...
translation: 你的话语里有真理。你的背后有一个国家的影子，一个人民的希望...

original: Your actions have carried strength. If we must survive to carry its message... then that is what shall be done. I will not let America die here.
translation: 你的行动带来了力量。如果我们必须生存下去，以传递它的信息...那就应该这样做。我不会让美国死在这里。

original: Let's make something new from the old. The Mojave awaits.
translation: 让我们用旧世之物来重新创造，莫哈维等着我们。

original: I'm sure, but I want you to stay in the area. Lay low in your old camp at Wolfhorn Ranch for now.
translation: 我确定，但我希望你能留在这里。暂时躲在狼角农场的老营地里。

original: So be it. Until then, I wait and watch, see what the road brings.
translation: 那就这样吧。在这之前，我等着看，看这条路会带来什么。

original: I'm sure, but I want you to stay in the area. Make camp somewhere in the Mojave and lay low.
translation: 我确定，但我希望你能留在这里。暂时躲在莫哈维扎营。

original: So be it. Until then, I wait and watch, see what the road brings.
translation: 那就这样吧。在这之前，我等着看，看这条路会带来什么。

original: How do you think Caesar's death will affect the battle for Hoover Dam?
translation: 你认为凯撒的死会对胡佛大坝之战有什么影响？

original: We've shown them fear, but not enough. More will come. Lanius... the "Butcher." Monster, Terror of the East.
translation: 我们已经让他们恐惧，不过还不够。还会有人前来。勒留斯...“屠夫”，怪物，东方的梦魇。

original: When he arrives, he'll fall on Hoover Dam like a hammer, break the Bear in two.
translation: 当他到来，便会像一柄锤击打在胡佛水坝上，将巨熊一分为二。

original: Hoover Dam. It's the wall by which this age will be measured, the gravestone of the Mojave.
translation: 胡佛水坝，这是衡量这个时代的墙，是莫哈维的墓碑。

original: If your path takes you there, know you're not the only one. I will not let America die here. Let's end this, Courier, you and I.
translation: 如果你的道路将你引向那里，记住你不是独自一人。我不会让美国死在这里的。让我们结束这一切吧，信使，你和我。

original: I intend to take Hoover Dam for the NCR. Will this be a problem?
translation: 我打算帮NCR拿下胡佛大坝。这会有问题吗？

original: The Bear grows without structure, follows a symbol without knowing its history.
translation: 熊逐渐成长，却没有自己的结构。它跟随一个符号，却不知道其历史。

original: Same symbols as before the war, now a flag carried by a tribe of children.
translation: 一如战争之前的图腾符号，如今是一面由新生文明背负的旗帜。

original: Still... There might be something saving in them. That is what you proved to me at the Divide.
translation: 但...也许有什么东西存于他们之中。这就是你在大裂谷向我证明的。

original: There is nothing more to be said between us. Speeches are things of NCR, words without strength.
translation: 我们之间无需多言。NCR才执着于空谈，话语是如此无力。只有行动才能更有力的表达。

original: Your actions have carried strength. More importantly... You came from the West, walked there.
translation: 你的行动包含着力量。更重要的是...你来自西边，一路走来。

original: If you speak for the two-headed Bear, I'll hear your words. It is enough.
translation: 如果你为那双头巨熊发声代言，我会聆听你的。这就够了。

original: Lanius. You have forgotten all you were, traded glory for savagery. I'll end you - and your history.
translation: 勒留斯，你已完全遗忘你曾身为何物，将荣耀换来奴役。我会终结你 - 还有你的过往。

original: I'm going to claim the Dam for the Legion. If this is a problem, speak now.
translation: 我要为军团占领大坝。如果有问题的话，现在就说吧。

original: The Legion... they carry Old World ideas into an age that no longer needs them, where they cannot live.
translation: 军团...他们把旧世的种种思想带入一个再也不需要它们的时代，一个它们无法立足的时代。

original: Caesar's words... I honored them. And Caesar was big on strength making right.
translation: 凯撒的话语...我很尊敬那些话语。而凯撒很强大，力量足以纠正事物。

original: Your actions have carried strength. More importantly... there is conviction in your words, enough to rival a Legate, perhaps Caesar.
translation: 你的行动包含着力量。更重要的是...你的话语中有坚定的信念，足以匹敌一位特使，甚至是凯撒。

original: There might be something saving in them. That is what you proved to me at the Divide. Perhaps the shadow of the Bull does walk with you.
translation: 也许有什么东西存于他们之中。这就是你在大裂谷向我证明的。也许公牛的影子确实与你同在。

original: If you feel I do not know the Legion's strength - then I will listen. It is enough.
translation: 如果你觉得我不知道军团的实力 - 那我就听你的。这就足够了。

original: I'm consolidating the Mojave under House's control. Is this going to be an issue between us?
translation: 我要把莫哈维合并到豪斯的控制之下。这将会成为我们之间的问题吗？

original: Vegas is born of the corrupt, the blind, lost, that gather to it. Without them... it would fall dark.
translation: 维加斯是由腐败者、盲目者、迷失者所生，他们聚集在这里。没有他们...它将陷入黑暗。

original: Yet... You believe. If you believe in something enough, you must be willing to let it burn, lest it claim you.
translation: 但是...你相信它。如果你有足够的信念，你必须让它燃烧起来，免得它支配你。

original: There might be something saving in them. That is what you proved to me at the Divide.
translation: 也许有什么东西存于他们之中。这就是你在大裂谷向我证明的。

original: Let its light give you what strength it can. Not for House, but for the families on the Strip.
translation: 让它的光亮给你带来力量。不是为了豪斯，而是为了赌城区的家族。

original: If you believe that Vegas does not deserve to die as the Bear does... then I will listen. It is enough.
translation: 如果你认为维加斯不应该像熊那样死去...那我就听你的。这就够了。

original: NCR, Legion, House - I've had enough of them all. I'll keep Vegas independent, no matter what.
translation: NCR，军团，豪斯 - 我受够了这一切。无论如何我都会保持维加斯的独立。

original: There's a strength in that... lack of attachment.
translation: 这里面有一种力量...没有附庸。

original: The Old World died long ago. Anyone who believes they can make it return and everything will be as it was...
translation: 旧世界早已死去。有些人相信他们可以让一切重现，一切都会像以前一样...

original: ...it is a dangerous belief. Needs to be silenced before their belief spreads.
translation: ...这种想法很危险。不能让他们的想法传播出去。

original: The West. The East. It doesn't matter - the death of either one kills the other, Vegas along with it.
translation: 东边，西边，都无所谓 - 哪一边死去，另一边也会死去，维加斯也一样。

original: After this, only one flag will remain over the Mojave. Let it give you what strength it can.
translation: 在此之后，莫哈维的天空只能有一面旗帜飘扬。让它来给予你力量。

original: If we cannot prevent what comes, then let us make our stand here. Two Couriers, together. What I do now is an act of conviction.
translation: 如果我们不能阻止即将到来的，那就让我们在这里表态吧。两位信使，一起行动。我现在所做的，是一种信念的行为。

original: Speeches are things of NCR, words without strength. Actions would have had more voice.
translation: NCR才执着于空谈，话语是如此无力。只有行动才能更有力的表达。

original: Shadow of the Bull
translation: 公牛之影

original: Ulysses' experience as a former Frumentarius of the Legion has left him with a wealth of knowledge in the arts of assassination and subterfuge. While Ulysses is a companion, the damage of your sneak attack criticals is raised by 25%.
translation: 尤利西斯作为前军团特务的经历使他在暗杀和狡猾艺术方面拥有丰富的知识。 尤利西斯在你的队伍里时，偷袭爆击的伤害提高25％。

original: Ulysses has given you the Shadow of the Bull perk.
translation: 尤利西斯给了你公牛之影的能力！

original: You have lost Ulysses' Shadow of the Bull perk.
translation: 你失去了尤利西斯的公牛之影能力！

original: Ulysses has gone to the Lucky 38.
translation: 尤利西斯回到了幸运38

original: Ulysses has returned to the Divide.
translation: 尤利西斯回到了大裂谷

original: Ulysses has returned to Wolfhorn Ranch.
translation: 尤利西斯回到了狼角农场

original: Ulysses has died.
translation: 尤利西斯已经死了

original: Wolfhorn Farmhouse
translation: 狼号牧场

original: Mojave Wasteland
translation: 莫哈维废土

original: Wolfhorn Ranch
translation: 狼号牧场

original: The Divide
translation: 大裂谷
